content: crochet this cozy 4 square blanket to snuggle up in on cold days if you re looking for a fun and vibrant colour work blanket and love the moss stitch then this is the perfect project for you this blanket looks complicated but once you get the hang of the moss stitch a single_crochet and chain 1 stitch combination then it becomes a really fun mindless crochet project > the free pattern for the large baby blanket 42 x 42 can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms video tutorials yes step-by-step video tutorials are included in the pdf * the pdf includes instructions for 8 blanket sizes small baby 34 x 34 large baby 42 x 42 lapghan 50 x 50 small throw 58 x 58 medium throw 66 x 66 large throw 74 x 74 queen 90 x 90 and king 106 x 106 * the pdf also includes step-by-step pictures and video tutorials * the printable pdf is a total of 16 pages * 4 video tutorials are included in the pdf to help you with the center squares sewing the squares together the main colour block and the 4-colour block > other details * 5 5mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-4-square-blanket/
